text:
e="preserve">Thomas William "Tom" Allin (27 November 1987 – 4 January 2016) was an English cricketer. He was a right-arm medium-fast pace bowler who also batted right-handed. He played for Warwickshire. He was born in Bideford, Devon.
Allin died on 4 January 2016 in Bideford, aged 28. He jumped to his death off a bridge.
